instruction: Patient should report if dizziness or fatigue becomes more noticeable or bothersome.

coding.display: Advice to report signs and symptoms

attributes.comment: Patient should report if dizziness or fatigue becomes more noticeable or bothersome.

instruction: Patient should report any unusual muscle aches, especially in the legs, while on atorvastatin.

coding.display: Advice to report signs and symptoms

attributes.comment: Patient should report any unusual muscle aches, especially in the legs, while on atorvastatin.
